channel.title: Lecture 1: Introduction and Overview of the Course :: Introduction to ML 1D034 homepage.
channel.description: Todayâ€™s Topic Overview of the course and introduction to machine learning. What is supervised learning and what is unsupervised learning. Link to the slides. I use these slides. Reading Guide The Hundred-Page Machine Learning Book Chapter 1, Chapter 2 contains some background mathematics and some definitions that you should know. What should I know by the end of this lecture? How is the course organised? What is machine learning? What is supervised learning? What is unsupervised learning?
